text: Colima has 18 unique radio stations, with three of those also broadcasting on AM in addition to FM. All of the stations are concentrated in the Colima, Manzanillo and Tecomán areas. ==Colima City== {| class="sortable wikitable" ! data-sort-type="number" | Frequency ! data-sort-type="number" | Power !
